welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saraland, a charming city known for its southern hospitality and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Mobile Downtown Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Regional Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse at Mobile Regional Airport, serving domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse at Mobile Regional Airport, serving domestic flights for airlines such as United and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
